Html: Can anyone explain how to install the new styles - directions on the website are not very clear and i can't figure it out, not v good at this stuff! Any help would be appreciated! Thanks!

What part of http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Styles&referringTitle=Documentation don't you understand?

Assuming you have Windows Vista and installed Office to the default location, you can just press the Windows button and in the "Start Search" field, type "%programfiles%\Microsoft Office\Office12\Bibliography\Style". That should lead you to the directory where you can put the bibliography styles.

Assuming you have Windows XP and installed Office to the default location, you can just press the Start button and select Run. In the dialog, type "%programfiles%\Microsoft Office\Office12\Bibliography\Style". That should lead you to the directory where you can put the bibliography styles.
